reviewText: My Daughter is addicted to the Carebears. I was so happy to find a collection that has the shows I remember as a kid. I am not to fond of the new Carebear cartoons. Once again, Amazon comes through. Can't beat the price either!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I got this for my two-year-old because she was all of a sudden interested in my old care bear dolls - the movie is pretty dated (although it pains me to say).  She still loves it and asks to watch it all the time.
summary: Takes me back to my childhood.

reviewText: Our 2yo was asking to see Care Bears constantly, and it's not easy to find them on-demand - or in retail stores.  She's very happy to have this in her collection.  It features 4 stories and has a long run time.  ;)
Title: N/A

reviewText: My granddaughter watched with great interest. I asked her which was her favorite and she was unable to pick, so there is consistency in the stories. I don't particularly love the Care Bears as Charlotte does, but the stories aren' t as tiring to watch as some others.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Good movie DVD...Care Bears: Four Feature Set......I have always liked this movie...childhood favorite....I will donate this to the pubic library so other people may enjoy it also!~
summary: Good movie DVD....Good movie DVD.....Ultimate Wildlife: Bizarre Animals....I have always liked this movie...I love animal movies
Title: N/A

reviewText: Who doesn't love the Carebears!? the orginal carebears are what i grew up on! now i can share them with my family and they all love them as much as i did! They have some hidden lessons in them that i didn't realize i was learning from when i was little. but now that i am older and am watching them i can see where i learned some of the things that i do now!  There is one of the stores that actually made me cry when i figured out what it was about.  it was the story about the sleeping Giant.  it has a hidden meaning about helping a child deal with death!  it is just AWESOME! this is a MUST have for any child!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought these DVD's for my grand children. They enjoy them very much and often want to discuss the stories that they have enjoyed. The DVD's are well crafted as a quality entertainment.
Title: N/A
